product_name: REI Northway Ponte Skirt - Plus Size
long_description: The REI Northway Ponte plus-size skirt is a savvy travel companion. The rayon/nylon/spandex fabric has a nice drape, resists wrinkles and dries in under 4 hours for convenient overnight washing. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Wide waistband has an elastic tunnel for flattering, stable fit; snap-flap cargo pocket; zip hand pockets.
short_description: The REI Northway Ponte plus-size skirt is a savvy travel companion. The rayon/nylon/spandex fabric has a nice drape, resists wrinkles and dries in under 4 hours for convenient overnight washing.
